column9: 2015 at home. he was born january 15
column12: son of the late william congley and margaret rosoldi congley. in addition to his parents
column13: he is preceded in death by his loving wife. gregory proudly served his country in the united states army and worked as a mercury distiller for sylvania electric. service information will be announced at a later date. condolences may be made to: www. burroughsfh. com burroughs funeral home and cremation services of murrells inlet (843. 651. 1440) is in charge of arrangements.
